title: Change currency from dollar to Indian Rupee (INR)

requirements.text: Replace all dollar sign ($) currency symbols with Indian Rupee symbol (₹) throughout the frontend application

quotes: NO CAN YOU PLEASE CHANGE THE PRICE FROM DOLLAR TO INR

acceptanceCriteria: All instances of '$' are replaced with '₹' in the UI
No dollar symbols remain visible in any frontend component

requirements.text: Update all price-related data models in backend/main.mo to store and return prices in INR instead of dollars

quotes: NO CAN YOU PLEASE CHANGE THE PRICE FROM DOLLAR TO INR

acceptanceCriteria: Backend data models use INR as the currency unit
All price values are stored in INR
Currency type or unit is documented in backend types if applicable

requirements.text: Update all price input fields and displays across ProfilePage.tsx, CreateBookingPage.tsx, BookingDetailPage.tsx, and DiscoveryPage.tsx to show INR symbol (₹) and use appropriate INR formatting

quotes: NO CAN YOU PLEASE CHANGE THE PRICE FROM DOLLAR TO INR

acceptanceCriteria: Price input fields display ₹ prefix or INR label
Price displays use ₹ symbol throughout the application
Number formatting follows Indian numbering system conventions where appropriate

constraints: Do not modify Internet Identity authentication logic in useInternetIdentity.ts
Do not edit UI component sources in frontend/src/components/ui
Preserve existing booking and profile data structures
nonGoals: Historical price migration or data conversion
